root.name: Karaoke Revolution Party
root.description: Soundtrack"(I've Had) the Time of My Life" by Bill Medley Jennifer Warnes"(You Make Me Feel Like) a Natural Woman" by Aretha Franklin"Ain't Nothing Like the Real Thing" by Marvin Gaye Tammi Terrell"Ain't Too Proud to Beg" by the Temptations"Always" by Atlantic Starr"American Woman" by Lenny Kravitz"Cal Me" by Blondie"Crazy" by Aerosmith"Crazy in Love" by Beyonce Jay-Z"Do You Really Want to Hurt Me?" by Culture Club"Drive" by Incubus"Dust in the Wind" by Kansas"Endless Love" by Diana Ross Lionel Richie"Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic" by the Police"Everybody Wants to Rule the World" by Tears for Fears"Everywhere" by Michelle Branch"Fame" by Irene Cara"Fly" by Hilary Duff"For You I Will" by Monica"Headstrong" by Trapt"Here I Go Again" by Whitesnake"I Don't Want to Be" by Gavin DeGaw"I Left My Heart in San Francisco" by Tony Bennett"I Love Rock 'N Roll" by Joan Jett and the Blackhearts"I Will Always Love You" by Whitney Houston"If You Could Only See" by Tonic"Material Girl" by Madonna"Pain" by Jimmy Eat World"Pieces of Me" by Ashlee Simpson"Play That Funky Music" by Wild Cherry"Start Me Up" by the Rolling Stones"Superstition" by Stevie Wonder"Sweet Caroline" by Neil Diamond"Take On Me" by a-ha"That's Amore" by Dean Martin"The Game of Love" by Santana"Time after Time" by Cyndi Lauper"Truth Is" by Fantasia"Turn the Beat Around" by Gloria Estefan"Unforgettable" by Nat King Cole Natalie Cole"Uptown Girl" by Billy Joel"What I Like About You" by the Romantics"Who Can It Be Now?" by Men at Work"You're My Best Friend" by Queen"Brick House" by the Commodores (Secret Song)"Greatest Love of All" by Whitney Houston (Secret Song)"I'll Be" by Edwin McCain (Secret Song)"Me and Bobby McGee" by Janis Joplin (Secret Song)"Takin' Care of Business" by Bachman-Turner Overdrive (Secret Song)"Waiting for a Girl Like You" by Foreigner (Secret Song)
